question: Who are your services for?
title: Our software solutions are tailored for

items.content: Final-year students (projects for academic submission)
Businesses and startups (custom web, mobile, desktop apps)
Individuals seeking digital tools or automation for their needs

question: What types of software do you deliver?
title: We develop

items.content: Web Applications (Frontend + Backend)
Android Mobile Apps
Desktop Applications (Java, Python, etc.)
Backend Services (APIs, Databases, Authentication)
Full Final-Year Projects with documentation

question: How long does it take to complete a project?
title: We usually deliver

items.content: Student Projects: within 5–10 working days
Small Business Solutions: within 10–20 working days
Medium-scale apps or systems: timeline will be discussed based on scope

conclusion: Timelines can vary based on workload and complexity — quality is my priority.

question: Do you offer source code and documentation?
title: Yes. For every project, We provide

items.content: Full source code
README / Setup Instructions
For student projects: full documentation (SRS, UML, PPT, etc.) if requested
Yes, We provide 2 free revisions within 7 days of delivery. Additional changes beyond that may involve extra charges depending on effort and complexity.

question: What technologies do you use?
title: Some of the core technologies we work with include

items.content: Frontend: HTML, CSS3, Tailwind, Bootstrap, ReactJS
Backend: Java (Spring Boot), Node.js, Express
Databases: MySQL, MongoDB
Mobile/Desktop: Java (Android/Swing), Kotlin, Python

question: How do I request a project or service?
title: You can reach out via

items.content: Email or WhatsApp (details on the Contact page)
Share your requirements or reference projects
we'll get back to you within 24 hours to discuss further

question: Do you offer support after delivery?
title: Yes. We offer

items.content: Student Support: For viva/preparation until project submission
Business Support: Bug fixes and setup assistance for 15 days post-delivery

conclusion: Long-term support/maintenance can be discussed separately.

question: What are the payment terms?

items.content: For small/student projects: 50% advance, 50% after delivery
For larger projects: Milestone-based payment schedule

conclusion: Secure payment via UPI, bank transfer, or Razorpay.

question: What if I need urgent delivery?

items.content: Urgent requests are accepted based on availability and may include an additional fee. Contact me with the exact deadline, and We'll confirm if it's feasible.

question: Do you sign NDAs or project agreements?

items.content: Yes, if required by startups or business clients, We are open to signing NDAs and mutual agreements to protect your idea and data.
